item.title: app.m4d.ibm.com
item.description: API Reference Packages app.m4d.ibm.com/v1alpha1 app.m4d.ibm.com/v1alpha1 Package v1alpha1 is used within the M4DApplication Package v1alpha1 contains API Schema definitions for the api v1alpha1 API group

item.title: motion.m4d.ibm.com
item.description: API Reference Packages motion.m4d.ibm.com/v1alpha1 motion.m4d.ibm.com/v1alpha1 Package v1 contains API Schema definitions for the motion v1 API group Resource Types BatchTransfer StreamTransfer

item.title: connectors
item.description: Services DataCredentialService rpc GetCredentialsInfo(DatasetCredentialsRequest) returns (DatasetCredentials) DataCatalogService rpc GetDatasetInfo(CatalogDatasetRequest) returns (CatalogDatasetInfo) PolicyManagerService rpc GetPoliciesDecisions(ApplicationContext) returns (PoliciesDecisions) Types DatasetCredentials Field Type Description Required datasetId string identifier of asset - always needed.
